page.title: 10SHOPS IN HORNCASTLE
page.content:
We spoke to many shop owners in Horncastle.This is a summary of their answers to our questions.
Many of the owners of smaller shops in Horncastle would like to be positioned nearer to the town centre, where most of the bigger shops can afford to stay.The bigger shops can also get deliveries when they are needed and they can order products which are not normally stocked. However, the smaller shops have to wait for deliveries and are sometimes unable to supply a customer's needs. These shops receive deliveries two or three times a month .
Most shops, small or large, are open five or six days a week. Some smaller shops are open on Sundays which helps their sales.
